summary: Logo asset paths were centralized in a new `brandAssets` module and header/footer + SEO metadata were updated to reference the new empowerment-themed filenames. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the new image files were actually added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and there appear to be additional unrequested UI/content changes in header/footer beyond swapping logo assets and SEO metadata.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create an updated ocean-themed brand logo concept that visually communicates empowerment, leadership/market ownership, and upward growth while remaining premium/clean and readable at small sizes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows code referencing new filenames; it does not include or describe the actual generated/edited image assets or their visual qualities, so the logo concept itself cannot be verified as implemented from this diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all newly generated logo image assets are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced as static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: No added/modified files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` are shown in the diff summary, so asset placement/existence cannot be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation/layout changes beyond swapping the logo asset (e.g., “larger right-aligned desktop navigation”, additional styling changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals specify not changing site sections/content beyond what is required to swap logo assets and SEO metadata, but the diff summary indicates broader header UI changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer layout/content changes beyond swapping the logo asset (e.g., three-column grid layout, quick links, attribution/UTM tracking mentioned in summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals specify avoiding content/section changes beyond logo/SEO swaps, but the diff summary describes additional footer redesign/content elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new ‘single source of truth’ brand asset constants module.
hallucinated_features.reason: Centralizing asset paths in a new module was not requested explicitly (though it supports the requested logo updates).
